name: Gloom Haven
description:
The town of Gloom Haven is known for the house on the hill, home of the scientist. At night, screams can be heard from the illuminated building, and fresh patches of dirt are always found in the yard, almost as if something was buried or disposed of recently. 

Young people from out of town would enter, claiming to have been hired by the Scientist, and they enter the building to never be heard from again....

Credits:

Music:

HORROR SOUNDS - 10 Ambient Loops/Soundscapes (Hallowed Grounds and Exploring the Depths) by Scott Arc at https://www.youtube.com/scottarcmusic

Sprites: 

Stealthix at https://stealthix.itch.io/
